--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Assassin" <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> OOC: I'm back!
> 
> : : Darkangel/Wolfenstein/SharpClaws/Kup : :
> 
> Darkangel, Wolfenstein and SharpClaws all stop fighting and stand 
by 
> their respective commanders. Wolf and Claws are somewhat damaged 
but 
> look strong. Darkangel has severe damge done to his exostructure.
> 
> SharpClaws: Why stand down, Hydras? They attacked us, we should 
> destroy them!
> 
> On the outskirts of the battlefield, Kup waits in truck mode. He 
> waits to see the results of Azure's actions.
